text:
The <propertyfile> task has no 3rd party dependencies and is practically useful 
in all builds.   Having it as an optional.jar task adds to the overhead 
involved in using it.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
The spearation between optional and built-in task is somewhat artifical,
especially since optional.jar has become a part of the "normal" distribution
with 1.4.1.

We'll have to think about what is part of an Ant distribution and what should be
a separate download for Ant 2 when we have the task libraries.
